overview:
Advolve Media Inc. (AVM) is a young, energetic advertising and in-house promotional service provider. Aimed at offering a digital network of interactive, technologically advanced, high-quality advertising mediums.

AVM develops proprietary hardware-software that will turn the entire indoor advertising industry on its head. Featuring interactive mirror technology placed right in the places everyone already looks –in the washroom mirrors of high traffic venues. Video-capable advertising is triggered upon a user’s approach to the mirror, playing advertising through the glass itself in a strategically placed position in their peripheral view. As a user steps away, the ad vanishes, restoring it to a perfect mirror. For that perfect aesthetic appeal, any size and any style mirror can be retrofitted. Best of all, each medium tracks traffic volumes and exactly how long each individual interacts with it.

AVM software offers an un-paralleled number of parameters for advertisers to focus specifically on their target markets. They offer a physical advertising medium that combines an online advertising structure. Imagine live feeds, full analytics, unlimited opportunities to change and tweak campaigns, and a charge per-impression model. Advolve’s software platform offers a bridge between traditional media and online advertising.

We push ourselves to continue to revolutionize the advertiser-user experience by utilizing the most advanced interactivity and analytical technology.

We are the future of indoor advertising. We are Advolve Media.
